name: GadgetTown
overview:
Headquartered in Brooklyn NY, US, GadgetTown is a solution-oriented company, making it easy for customers to stay in step with advancing technologies that span across multiple markets in the consumer electronics industry, daily necessities, outdoor sport, home & garden, hobbies & toys and so on. Providing freedom and convenience for the consumers, GadgetTown always remains true to its on going commitment “to offer you the most innovative and efficient way to search and purchase the highest quality products in the most cost effective way.” Serving hundreds of worldwide known brands from thousands of industry-leading manufacturers, GadgetTown is widely recognized for its honesty, high efficiency and comprehensive service. Furthermore, the company’s customer-focused strategy has brought us to become a leading outlet in consumer electronics sales.

MISSION STATEMENT - To provide the highest level of service, integrity and product value to ensure customer satisfaction.

VISION STATEMENT - To be the global top 10 in international E-commerce trade.
